text: Chumsaeng railway station is a railway station located in Chumsaeng Subdistrict, Chumsaeng District, Nakhon Sawan. It is located 280.294 km from Bangkok railway station and is a class 1 railway station. It is on the Northern Line of the State Railway of Thailand. The station opened on 24 January 1908 as part of the Northern Line extension from Pak Nam Pho to Phitsanulok. ==Train services== * Special Express 3/4 Bangkok-Sawankhalok/Sila At-Bangkok * Rapid 109/102 Bangkok-Chiang Mai-Bangkok * Rapid 105/106 Bangkok- Sila At-Bangkok * Rapid 107/112 Bangkok-Den Chai-Bangkok * Rapid 111/108 Bangkok-Den Chai-Bangkok * Ordinary 201/202 Bangkok-Phitsanulok-Bangkok * Ordinary 211/212 Bangkok-Taphan Hin-Bangkok * Local 401/402 Lop Buri- Phitsanulok-Lop Buri * Local 407/408 Nakhon Sawan-Chiang Mai-Nakhon Sawan == References == * Ichirō, Kakizaki (2010). Ōkoku no tetsuro: tai tetsudō no rekishi. Kyōto: Kyōtodaigakugakujutsushuppankai. * Otohiro, Watanabe (2013). Tai kokutetsu yonsenkiro no tabi: shasō fūkei kanzen kiroku. Tōkyō: Bungeisha. Category:Railway stations in Thailand
title: Chumsaeng railway station
